report.title: Simple report for triggers against a survey
report.description: Lists the most recent recordings in a specified survey.
report.query: SELECT su.title, su.website_id, o.id as occurrence_id, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type, lttl.taxon, s.entered_sref, l.name as location_name, oi.path, CASE o.record_status WHEN 'C' THEN 'Data Entry Complete' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Verified' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'I' THEN 'In Progress' WHEN 'T' THEN 'Test' ELSE '' END AS record_status, u.username as verified_by FROM samples s JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=s.id LEFT JOIN occurrence_images oi ON oi.occurrence_id=o.id JOIN surveys su ON s.survey_id = su.id JOIN list_taxa_taxon_lists lttl ON lttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id=o.verified_by_id WHERE su.id = '#survey#' AND o.created_on > '#date#' AND o.record_status NOT IN ('I','T') #order_by#

param.name: survey
param.description: Select the survey to return data for
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
